nodes.text: Esu Rotsino was a female politician who, prior to the Clone Wars, served as the senator for the agriworld Abrion Major in the Galactic Republic's Senate. Shortly after the outbreak of the war, Rotsino led the entire Abrion sector in defection from the Republic, citing inequitable trade and stifling bureaucracy.

Rotsino went on to represent the entire sector in the Separatist Senate. The sector, with several agriworlds other than Abrion Major, provided food to tempt starving star systems to the Separatist side of the war, and to cause food crises on Republic worlds.
